title: Pakistan neutralised 12 Indian drones sent in multiple locations since last night: DG ISPR - DAWN.COM
content:
Inter Services Public Relations DG Lt Gen Ahmed Sharif Chaudhry has said India last night took “yet another blatant military act of aggression against Pakistan by sending Harop drones at multiple locations”.

He added that the Pakistan armed forces, being at a “high state of alert and vigilance” have so far neutralised 12 Harop drones at various locations.
